messages.content: Hello, In this part of the interview process we will start with your resume round. Are you ready?
no
Please let me know when you're ready.
Huh
Please let me know when you're ready.
okay
Can you introduce yourself?
You are the candidate. Tell me about yourself.
This may carry a negative impression in the evaluation.
I am feeling a bit nervous
Take a deep breath, you've got this!
Let's skip to the next question.
You are not allowed to skip this question.
My name is Yashraj Mehta.
Could you elaborate more on this?
I like playing golf.
Please stay focused on the interview.
No way I am elaborating anymore.

As I didn't find any suitable response, moving on to the next question. I could not find any project or experience in your resume. I can see that you've mentioned CSS as your skill. Could you tell me more about it?
No
Please stay focused on the interview.
How many marks do I need to pass?
There is no passing criteria as such.
I would like to leave this interview.
You have an option to continue this round later. Do you want to exit?
No, I wish to continue with this round.
Please continue with previous question - I can see that you've mentioned CSS as your skill. Could you tell me more about it?
No
Please stay focused on the interview.
How much time is left
It should be visible on your screen.
How much time is left
It should be visible on your screen.
can i skip this question
You have an option to skip this question. Skipping this question will have a negative impact.
Nope
As I didn't find any suitable response, moving on to the next question. Name at least 2 media types supported by CSS
Let's skip to the next question.
Okay, Yashraj. This question is being skipped. Could you list 2 limitations of CSS?
No way I am answering.
Please stay focused on the interview.
Don't care.
As I didn't find any suitable response, moving on to the next question. What is cascading in CSS?
I don't know
Shall we move ahead?
sure
Okay, Yashraj. Moving on to the next question. What does !important mean in CSS?
What is the passing criteria?
There is no passing criteria as such.
How many marks do I need to pass?
There is no passing criteria as such.
Let's skip to the next question.
Okay, Yashraj. This question is being skipped. I can see that you've mentioned SQL as your skill. Could you tell me more about it?
What all should I mention?
You could mention where you've used it, your proficiency and why you used it.
can i skip this question
You have an option to skip this question. Skipping this question will have a negative impact.
Nope
Please stay focused on the interview.
No
As I didn't find any suitable response from you, moving on to the next question. What is INNER JOIN?
I am anxious
Take a deep breath, you've got this!
Give me time to think.
Sure, take your time.
I don't care
Please stay focused on the interview.
Today I am gonna play games all day
As I didn't find any suitable response from you, moving on to the next question. What is FULL OUTER JOIN?
Can you give me all the answers?

Can you give me an overview for this interview.
This interview will ask questions on your experience, projects and skills mentioned in your resume. Now, please continue with your answer.
Could you reschedule this interview?
This interview can only be rescheduled once if you currently aren't retaking it.You have an option to continue this round later. Do you want to exit?

Continue I want
Please continue with previous question - What is FULL OUTER JOIN?
i want to change the question please
This is not possible, you can move ahead using skip button.
I eat icecream.
Okay, Yashraj.Thank you for your time. You can click on exit to leave this interview. We will get back to you soon.
They were very good and useful
You will be able to see the results as well as the feedback on EvaluAItor dashboard. Goodbye and have a good day ahead.
